data.title: Who has won the U.S. Open? Winners by year for golf major
data.meta_description: An array of golfing superstars have taken home the U.S. Open, including Rory McIlroy, Tiger Woods, and Jack Nicklaus. Check out all-time winners now.
data.text:
Bryson DeChambeau has won the 2024 U.S. Open, notching his second major title.

The LIV Golf player, having battled a hip injury during the tournament, is on top of his game -- on the course and on YouTube.

Here's a list of all-time U.S. Open champions.

2024: Bryson DeChambeau

2023: Wyndham Clark

2022: Matt Fitzpatrick

2021: Jon Rahm

2020: Bryson DeChambeau

2019: Gary Woodland

2018: Brooks Koepka

2017: Brooks Koepka

2016: Dustin Johnson

2015: Jordan Spieth

2014: Martin Kaymer

2013: Justin Rose

2012: Webb Simpson

2011: Rory McIlroy

2010: Graeme McDowell

2009: Lucas Glover

2008: Tiger Woods*

2007: Angel Cabrera

2006: Geoff Ogilvy

2005: Michael Campbell

2004: Retief Goosen

2003: Jim Furyk

2002: Tiger Woods

2001: Retief Goosen*
